Posts.Content: Chemotherapy is the most effective tool we have in stopping, slowing and curing cancer. How a patient deals with hair loss from chemotherapy is very personal. I read one article on enhance quality life during chemotherapy. I hope it may help: http://www.sierranevadacancer.com/news/12-ways-enhance-quali
Posts.Title: Please help…. Not feeling good after Chemotherapy

Posts.Content: Triple negative breast cancer does not respond to hormonal therapy. Surgery, chemo and Radiation therapy are most effective treatment for triple negative metaplastic breast cancer. This focused part of the treatment, called a boost, is standard for women with invasive breast cancer to reduce the risk of a recurrence in the breast.
Posts.Title: triple negative metaplastic breast cancer

Posts.Content: If treatment of the axilla is indicated in patients with breast cancer who have a positive sentinel node, axillary lymph node dissection is the present standard. It is associated with significantly fewer side effects compared with the more traditional axillary lymph node dissection or removal technique.
Posts.Title: Axiallary Radiation

Posts.Content: My grandmother had mammogram last month, It shows that breast tissue was dense. Dense breast tissue is very common and is not abnormal. However, dense breast tissue can make it harder to find cancer on a mammogram and may also be associated with an increased risk of breast cancer. This information about the result of your mammogram is given to you to raise your awareness. So please do not penic and Good Luck!
